enhanced_description: 360Learning is a collaborative learning management system (LMS) designed to enable companies to upskill their workforce, customers, and partners by leveraging internal experts. The platform utilizes AI and collaborative features to transform in-house subject matter experts into Learning & Development (L&D) collaborators, moving beyond traditional top-down training methods. It serves as a unified platform for comprehensive onboarding of new joiners, continuous upskilling of employees, training customer-facing teams, and enabling external customers and partners. Key functionalities include automating mandatory compliance training and supporting the unique learning needs of the deskless workforce through relevant field training accessible on any device. 360Learning aims to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, improve employee happiness and engagement, and contribute to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce. Founded in 2013, 360Learning has achieved significant scale, powering 1,700 organizations.
